attributes.action: Wembley Stadium was built with millions of £ from charity funds pay them back
attributes.additional_details: Are the FA by selling Wembley Stadium considering the best interest of English Football in the long term or is this a money making short term reaction?
attributes.background: Wembley Stadium is going to be sold off to the highest bidder by the FA.  As the national stadium for football it was built with millions of pounds from charities and lottery funding.  Will this funding be paid back by the who ever purchases it?

rejection.details:
Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:

http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/219222
